ConnectionStrings.ConnectionStrings_Comment: The ConnectionStrings section contains database connection strings used by the application.

Identity.BearerTokenExpiration_Comment: BearerTokenExpiration used as JWT's expiration claim, access token's expires in and cookie's max age. Format: D.HH:mm:ss
Identity.MaxConcurrentPrivilegedSessions_Comment: Is the maximum number of concurrent privileged sessions a user can have.

Email.Host_Comment: Local folder means storing emails as .eml file in App_Data/sent-emails folder (Recommended for testing purposes only) instead of sending them using smtp server.

AdsPushVapid.AdsPushVapid_Comment: Web push's vapid. More info at https://tools.reactpwa.com/vapid
AdsPushVapid.Subject: mailto:test@bitplatform.dev
AdsPushVapid.PublicKey_Comment: Set public key in Client.Web's appsettings.json

AdsPushAPNS.P8PrivateKey_Comment: p8 certificate string without spaces and start/end tags.
AdsPushAPNS.P8PrivateKeyId_Comment: 10-digit p8 certificate id; often part of a downloadable certificate filename
AdsPushAPNS.TeamId_Comment: 10-digit Apple team id shown on the Apple Developer Membership Page
AdsPushAPNS.EnvironmentType_Comment: Apns Env one of Development or Production

Apple.ClientId_Comment: Your Service Id's Identifier such as com.adminpanel.bitplatform.dev

TrustedOrigins_Comment: Lists the permitted origins for CORS requests, return URLs following social sign-in and email confirmation, etc., along with allowed origins for Web Auth.

ForwardedHeaders.ForwardedHeaders_Comment: These values apply only if your backend is hosted behind a CDN (such as `Cloudflare`).
ForwardedHeaders.ForwardedHostHeaderName_Comment: For Cloudflare, use X-Host instead of X-Forwarded-Host.
ForwardedHeaders.AllowedHosts_Comment: If you're using a CDN like Cloudflare in front of your server, make sure to add your domain name to the `ForwardedHeaders:AllowedHosts` setting.

WebAppRender.PrerenderEnabled_Comment: for apps with Prerender enabled, follow the instructions in the Client.Web/wwwroot/service-worker.published.js file
